summary: The client approved the execution of sprint plan SP-001, which was successfully updated along with stories US-010, US-001, and US-015. Sprint execution has begun, with the AI team starting work on the stories.

decisions.title: Execute Sprint Plan SP-001
decisions.details: Client confirmed execution, leading to updates and start of sprint activities

sign_offs.what: Approved execution of sprint plan SP-001

actions.task: Begin working on the stories in sprint SP-001
